item.title: [c21] Erratic Cyclops
item.description:
Creature — Cyclops Shaman

Trample

Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, Erratic Cyclops gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is that spell's converted mana cost.

item.title: [c21] Dualcaster Mage
item.description:
Creature — Human Wizard

Flash

When Dualcaster Mage enters the battlefield, copy target instant or sorcery spell. You may choose new targets for the copy.

item.title: [c21] Charmbreaker Devils
item.description:
Creature — Devil

At the beginning of your upkeep, return an instant or sorcery card at random from your graveyard to your hand.

Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, Charmbreaker Devils gets +4/+0 until end of turn.

item.title: [c21] Sunbird's Invocation
item.description:
Enchantment

Whenever you cast a spell from your hand, reveal the top X cards of your library, where X is that spell's converted mana cost. You may cast a spell with converted mana cost X or less from among cards revealed this way without paying its mana cost. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

item.title: [c21] Seething Song
item.description:
Instant

Add {R}{R}{R}{R}{R}.

item.title: [c21] Mana Geyser
item.description:
Sorcery

Add {R} for each tapped land your opponents control.

item.title: [c21] Jaya Ballard
item.description:
Legendary Planeswalker — Jaya

+1: Add {R}{R}{R}. Spend this mana only to cast instant or sorcery spells.

+1: Discard up to three cards, then draw that many cards.

−8: You get an emblem with "You may cast instant and sorcery spells from your graveyard. If a spell cast this way would be put into your graveyard, exile it instead."

item.title: [c21] Humble Defector
item.description:
Creature — Human Rogue

{T}: Draw two cards. Target opponent gains control of Humble Defector. Activate this ability only during your turn.

item.title: [c21] Wildfire Devils
item.description:
Creature — Devil

When Wildfire Devils enters the battlefield and at the beginning of your upkeep, choose a player at random. That player exiles an instant or sorcery card from their graveyard. Copy that card. You may cast the copy without paying its mana cost.

item.title: [c21] Volcanic Vision
item.description:
Sorcery

Return target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand. Volcanic Vision deals damage equal to that card's converted mana cost to each creature your opponents control. Exile Volcanic Vision.

item.title: [c21] Call the Skybreaker
item.description:
Sorcery

Create a 5/5 blue and red Elemental creature token with flying.

Retrace (You may cast this card from your graveyard by discarding a land card in addition to paying its other costs.)

item.title: [c21] Crackling Drake
item.description:
Creature — Drake

Flying

Crackling Drake's power is equal to the total number of instant and sorcery cards you own in exile and in your graveyard.

When Crackling Drake enters the battlefield, draw a card.

item.title: [c21] Pyromancer's Goggles
item.description:
Legendary Artifact

{T}: Add {R}. When that mana is spent to cast a red instant or sorcery spell, copy that spell and you may choose new targets for the copy.

item.title: [c21] Izzet Signet
item.description:
Artifact

{1}, {T}: Add {U}{R}.

item.title: [c21] Epic Experiment
item.description:
Sorcery

Exile the top X cards of your library. You may cast instant and sorcery spells with converted mana cost X or less from among them without paying their mana costs. Then put all cards exiled this way that weren't cast into your graveyard.

item.title: [c21] Talisman of Creativity
item.description:
Artifact

{T}: Add {C}.

{T}: Add {U} or {R}. Talisman of Creativity deals 1 damage to you.

item.title: [c21] Izzet Boilerworks
item.description:
Land

Izzet Boilerworks enters the battlefield tapped.

When Izzet Boilerworks enters the battlefield, return a land you control to its owner's hand.

{T}: Add {U}{R}.

item.title: [c21] Desert of the Mindful
item.description:
Land — Desert

Desert of the Mindful enters the battlefield tapped.

{T}: Add {U}.

Cycling {1}{U} ({1}{U}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

item.title: [c21] Desert of the Fervent
item.description:
Land — Desert

Desert of the Fervent enters the battlefield tapped.

{T}: Add {R}.

Cycling {1}{R} ({1}{R}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

item.title: [c21] Blighted Cataract
item.description:
Land

{T}: Add {C}.

{5}{U}, {T}, Sacrifice Blighted Cataract: Draw two cards.

item.title: [c21] Reliquary Tower
item.description:
Land

You have no maximum hand size.

{T}: Add {C}.

item.title: [c21] Memorial to Genius
item.description:
Land

Memorial to Genius enters the battlefield tapped.

{T}: Add {U}.

{4}{U}, {T}, Sacrifice Memorial to Genius: Draw two cards.

item.title: [c21] Mage-Ring Network
item.description:
Land

{T}: Add {C}.

{1}, {T}: Put a storage counter on Mage-Ring Network.

{T}, Remove any number of storage counters from Mage-Ring Network: Add {C} for each storage counter removed this way.

item.title: [c21] Temple of Epiphany
item.description:
Land

Temple of Epiphany enters the battlefield tapped.

When Temple of Epiphany enters the battlefield, scry 1.

{T}: Add {U} or {R}.

item.title: [c21] Shivan Reef
item.description:
Land

{T}: Add {C}.

{T}: Add {U} or {R}. Shivan Reef deals 1 damage to you.

item.title: [c21] Scavenger Grounds
item.description:
Land — Desert

{T}: Add {C}.

{2}, {T}, Sacrifice a Desert: Exile all cards from all graveyards.

item.title: [c21] Inkshield
item.description:
Instant

Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to you this turn. For each 1 damage prevented this way, create a 2/1 white and black Inkling creature token with flying.

item.title: [c21] Tempting Contract
item.description:
Artifact

At the beginning of your upkeep, each opponent may create a Treasure token. For each opponent who does, you create a Treasure token.

item.title: [c21] Keen Duelist
item.description:
Creature — Human Wizard

At the beginning of your upkeep, you and target opponent each reveal the top card of your library. You each lose life equal to the mana value of the card revealed by the other player. You each put the card you revealed into your hand.

item.title: [c21] Incarnation Technique
item.description:
Sorcery

Demonstrate (When you cast this spell, you may copy it. If you do, choose an opponent to also copy it.)

Mill five cards, then return a creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.

item.title: [c21] Fain, the Broker
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Human Warlock

{T}, Sacrifice a creature: Put two +1/+1 counters on target creature.

{T}, Remove a counter from a creature you control: Create a Treasure token.

{T}, Sacrifice an artifact: Create a 2/1 white and black Inkling creature token with flying.

{3}{B}: Untap Fain, the Broker.

item.title: [c21] Cunning Rhetoric
item.description:
Enchantment

Whenever an opponent attacks you and/or one or more planeswalkers you control, exile the top card of that player's library. You may play that card for as long as it remains exiled, and you may spend mana as though it were mana of any color to cast it.

item.title: [c21] Bold Plagiarist
item.description:
Creature — Vampire Rogue

Flash

Whenever an opponent puts one or more counters on a creature they control, they put the same number and kind of counters on Bold Plagiarist.

item.title: [c21] Author of Shadows
item.description:
Creature — Shade Warlock

When Author of Shadows enters the battlefield, exile all cards from all opponents' graveyards. Choose a nonland card exiled this way. You may cast that card for as long as it remains exiled, and you may spend mana as though it were mana of any color to cast that spell.

item.title: [c21] Scholarship Sponsor
item.description:
Creature — Human Advisor

When Scholarship Sponsor enters the battlefield, each player who controls fewer lands than the player who controls the most lands searches their library for a number of basic land cards less than or equal to the difference, puts those cards onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffles.

item.title: [c21] Promise of Loyalty
item.description:
Sorcery

Each player puts a vow counter on a creature they control and sacrifices the rest. Each of those creatures can't attack you for as long as it has a vow counter on it.

item.title: [c21] Nils, Discipline Enforcer
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Human Cleric

At the beginning of your end step, for each player, put a +1/+1 counter on up to one target creature that player controls.

Each creature with one or more counters on it can't attack you or planeswalkers you control unless its controller pays {X}, where X is the number of counters on that creature.

item.title: [c21] Guardian Archon
item.description:
Creature — Archon

Flying

As Guardian Archon enters the battlefield, secretly choose an opponent.

Reveal the player you chose: You and target permanent you control each gain protection from the chosen player until end of turn. Activate only once.

item.title: [c21] Combat Calligrapher
item.description:
Creature — Bird Cleric

Flyinh

Inklings can't attack you or planeswalkers you control.

Whenever a player attacks one of your opponents, that attacking player creates a tapped 2/1 white and black Inkling creature token with flying that's attacking that opponent.

item.title: [c21] Felisa, Fang of Silverquill
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Vampire Wizard

Flying

Mentor (Whenever this creature attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on target attacking creature with lesser power.)

Whenever a nontoken creature you control dies, if it had counters on it, create X tapped 2/1 white and black Inkling creature tokens with flying, where X is the number of counters it had on it.

item.title: [c21] Oversimplify
item.description:
Sorcery

Exile all creatures. Each player creates a 0/0 green and blue Fractal creature token and puts a number of +1/+1 counters on it equal to the total power of creatures they controlled that were exiled this way,

item.title: [c21] Geometric Nexus
item.description:
Artifact

Whenever a player casts an instant or sorcery spell, put a number of charge counters on Geometric Nexus equal to that spell's mana value.

{6}, {T}, Remove all charge counters from Geometric Nexus: Create a 0/0 green and blue Fractal creature token. Put X +1/+1 counters on it, where X is the number of charge counters removed this way.

item.title: [c21] Sequence Engine
item.description:
Artifact

{X}, {T}: Exile target creature card with mana value X from a graveyard. Create a 0/0 green and blue Fractal creature token. Put X +1/+1 counters on it. Activate only as a sorcery.

item.title: [c21] Ruxa, Patient Professor
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Bear Druid

Whenever Ruxa, Patient Professor enters the battlefield or attacks, return target creature card with no abilities from your graveyard to your hand.

Creatures you control with no abilities get +1/+1.

You may have creatures you control with no abilities assign their combat damage as though they weren't blocked.

item.title: [c21] Paradox Zone
item.description:
Enchantment

Paradox Zone enters the battlefield with a growth counter on it.

At the beginning of your end step, double the number of growth counters on Paradox Zone. Then create a 0/0 blue and green Fractal creature token. Put X +1/+1 counters on it, where X is the number of growth counters on Paradox Zone.

item.title: [c21] Guardian Augmenter
item.description:
Creature — Troll Wizard

Flash

Commander creatures you control get +2/+2.

Commanders you control have hexproof.

item.title: [c21] Fractal Harness
item.description:
Artifact — Equipment

When Fractal Harness enters the battlefield, create a 0/0 green and blue Fractal creature token. Put X +1/+1 counters on it and attach Fractal Harness to it.

Whenever equipped creature attacks, double the number of +1/+1 counters on it.

Equip {2}

item.title: [c21] Theoretical Duplication
item.description:
Instant

Whenever a nontoken creature enters the battlefield under an opponent's control this turn, create a token that's a copy of that creature.

item.title: [c21] Spawning Kraken
item.description:
Creature — Kraken

Whenever a Kraken, Leviathan, Octopus, or Serpent you control deals combat damage to a player, create a 9/9 blue Kraken creature token.

item.title: [c21] Replication Technique
item.description:
Sorcery

Demonstrate (When you cast this spell, you may copy it. If you do, choose an opponent to also copy it. Players may choose new targets for their copies.)

Create a token that's a copy of target permanent you control.
